-- ============================================= -- Author: Татарков -- Create date: -- Description: -- ============================================= ALTER PROCEDURE [dbo].[ValidateDatabaseState] -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here
AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
-- проврка дубликатов цен на дату ( и между прайсами)
SELECT MIN(pg.[key]), pg.[date], pgd.good_id, COUNT(*) countDubl FROM [Dashboard].[dbo].[ent_PriceGoods] pg JOIN ent_PriceGoodsDetails pgd on pgd.priceGoods_id = pg.id
GROUP BY pg.[date], pgd.good_id HAVING COUNT(*)>1
-----------------Проверка дубликатов цен внутри документа на один товар------------------
select pd.* FROM [dbo].[ent_PriceGoodsDetails] pd join (
SELECT [priceGoods_id] ,[good_id]
FROM [dbo].[ent_PriceGoodsDetails] pgd join ent_PriceGoods pg on pgd.priceGoods_id=pg.id where pg.isDeleted=0 group by priceGoods_id, good_id having count(*)>1) pdd on pd.good_id=pdd.good_id and pd.priceGoods_id=pdd.priceGoods_id
order by recNum
-----------------Проверка дубликатов деталей отгрузок в кубе------------------ select dd.* FROM [dbo].olap_Details dd join ( SELECT [good_id], olapdelivery_id, recnum FROM [dbo].olap_Details pdd group by pdd.good_id, pdd.olapdelivery_id, recnum having count(*)>1) as pdd2 on dd.good_id=pdd2.good_id and dd.olapdelivery_id=pdd2.olapdelivery_id and dd.recNum=pdd2.recNum
order by recNum
END
